modShortDescription: This mod reduces enemy's reach to a more reasonable distance. Credit to JaxTeller718 for concept.
modDescription:
This mod reduces enemy’s reach to a more reasonable distance. Credit to JaxTeller718 for concept: this is a copy of [his](https://7daystodiemods.com/reduced-zombie-hand-reaches/) but with an even shorter reach, fixes to falloff damage, and is forward-compatible with new and custom enemies.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Updated to support A19 now. (Official Update)
* Updated for A19 by Doughphunghus.

**[Download](https://damned.cloud/files/MeanCloud__EnemyReachShortener_v1.02.zip)** for A19  
**[Download](https://damned.cloud/files/MeanCloud__EnemyReachShortener_v1.01.zip)** for A18

If you appreciate MeanCloud’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://paypal.me/MeanCloud).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24859-meanclouds-modlets-collection/).

**Credits:** [MeanCloud](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/meancloud/)
